name: Magical Cat Adventure
description: Magical Cat Adventure is a 2D arcade platform game. The player controls a magical cat wandering around levels which include a forest, caves, pirate ship, old castle, and heavens. The cat can use many strange weapons, from basic knives to special fire dragons. Extra weapons can be found in chests. The gameplay is quite traditional: the hero jumps on the various shelves, platforms, and rocks, kills enemies and avoids obstacles.
